# SingleStoreDataSourceBuilder.UseLoggerFactory method

Sets the ILoggerFactory that will be used for logging.

```csharp
public SingleStoreDataSourceBuilder UseLoggerFactory(ILoggerFactory? loggerFactory)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| loggerFactory | The logger factory. |

## Return Value

This builder, so that method calls can be chained.
